statements: SELECT * FROM messages
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT receiver_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_id = 3
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND sender_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE sender_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY sender_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING total_messages > 3 ORDER BY sender_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM board_members;
SELECT name, email, position FROM executives;
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM board_members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM executives WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT id, email, department FROM executives ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM board_members;
SELECT * FROM executives WHERE position='CEO';
SELECT id, name, email, department FROM executives WHERE id=1;
SELECT name, email FROM board_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM board_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM board_members;
SELECT name, email FROM executives ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, phone_number FROM board_members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM executives WHERE position = 'CEO';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM board_members WHERE email LIKE '%example.com' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM executives ORDER BY name DESC, position ASC;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM board_members UNION SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM executives;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM board_members WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM board_members;
SELECT id, name, email FROM board_members WHERE position = 'Chairman';
SELECT * FROM executives ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT id, title, department FROM executives WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM executives WHERE title = 'CEO';
SELECT name, department FROM executives WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM board_members WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT m.id, m.message_text, ma.attachment_url FROM messages m JOIN message_attachments ma ON m.id = ma.message_id;
SELECT * FROM BoardMembers;
SELECT member_name, email FROM BoardMembers WHERE role = 'Chairperson';
SELECT * FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT attachment_name, attachment_type FROM Attachments WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT notification_text, is_read FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM BoardMembers;
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM BoardMembers WHERE role='Chairman';
SELECT * FROM Executives ORDER BY department DESC, executive_name ASC;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE sender_id=1 AND receiver_id=2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_text, timestamp FROM Notifications WHERE is_read=FALSE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
